content_impact: Top-voted content appears on the front page
author_impact: Each upvote adds +1 karma to the author
Each downvote subtracts -1 karma from the author
Karma reflects the quality of your contributions

dos: Upvote: quality content, well-argued, useful or entertaining
Downvote: spam, offensive content, misinformation or off-topic
Read before voting, don't just vote by title
Vote based on quality, not personal agreement/disagreement
donts: Don't vote out of revenge or to attack someone
Don't use multiple accounts to manipulate votes
Don't vote all content from a user (positive or negative)
Don't sell your vote or participate in vote brigading

karma_explained.title: What is Karma?
karma_explained.description: Karma is your reputation score. It's calculated by adding up all votes your posts and comments receive.
karma_explained.calculation: Karma = Upvotes - Downvotes (from all your content)
karma_explained.importance: Karma reflects your history of valuable contributions to the community.
karma_explained.permanent_levels: Levels are permanent: once achieved, they are not lost even if your karma decreases (except for administrative sanctions).

how_it_works: Receive karma when others upvote your posts and comments
Lose karma when others downvote your contributions
Higher karma unlocks additional features and privileges
Karma levels show your standing in the community
earning_tips: Follow community guidelines and be respectful
